Control Name: 3.7.5 You are testing all appropriate components for performance.
Control Statement: Most people think of load testing as the only form of performance testing. However, there are different types of performance testing--load testing, stress testing, API testing, client-side/browser testing, etc.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.7 How are you testing to ensure that you workload can appropriately handle user load?
